==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|甲|香}}

===Etymology 1===
* penatari → ɸenatari → henatari.

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|へなたり}}

# a fragrance made up of the operculum of a [[w:Veined rapa whelk|Veined rapa whelk]]

===Etymology 2===
* kapikau → kaɸikau → kaɸikɔː → *kawikɔː → kaikoː.

====Alternative forms====
* {{l|ja|貝香}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|かいこう|hhira=かひかう}}

# the [[w:Operculum (gastropod)|operculum]] of a shell; often that belong to a [[w:Veined rapa whelk|Veined rapa whelk]]
# a fragrance made up of such a ground up operculum

===Etymology 3===
